alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 11 at 10:49PM CDT until May 12 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following counties, Palo Pinto and Parker. * WHEN...Until 200 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mineral Wells, Graford, Poolville, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Cool, Lake Palo Pinto, Lake Mineral Wells, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Strawn, Millsap, Mingus, Adell, Advance, New Salem, Salesville, Lone Camp, Brazos, Bennett and Santo.
